mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SQUARE DANCES "Tavern in the Town", and "Illegitimate Star". ROUND DANCES "Waltz Delight", and "Wedding of the Painted Doll". SPECIAL FEATURES "Bud Brown's Barn", "Organ Music", "Festival in Yakima", "Gearing Up for Fall", "Proud of Being a Square Dancer?", "Just Picture This...", "Corner of the Square", and "Summer Institute Asilomar - 1952". REGULAR FEATURES "As I See It", "First National Square Dance Convention", "The Square of the Month: Eaton Hash", "'Round the Outside Ring", "The Green Sheet", "From the Floor", and "Calendar of Square Dancing Events".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
